item.description: hscrypt demos # Examples using hscrypt and hscrypt-webpack-plugin to encrypt and deploy static sites. hscrypt simulates “anyone with the link can view” permissioning for publicly-hosted static web apps (e.g. on GitHub Pages). Please read the Disclaimer section before using. Hello World # Here’s a simple example (taken from 00-simple; see also 01-api which exercises various client-side hscrypt APIs for interacting with the decryption process and user): <!-- index.html --> <html> <body> This page is encrypted!
